transcript:
Customer: Nahi nahi fir tujhse pe baat karte.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan good evening sir, Kadir bol raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Customer: Maine baat kiya tha sir ji, theek hai na?
Customer: Woh wohi keh rahe the Kadir ji woh conversion ke liye matlab woh hum surety toh nahi dete hain. Lekin hum inquiry ke liye kya hai toh woh hum discuss kar sakte hain.
Customer: Ek inquiry de rahi hai, ek payment kar raha tha humne.
Executive: Haan haan.

Customer: Hey.
Executive: Sir aapka number toh bhai rehta hai pata nahi.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Customer: Woh main baat kiya maine unse, theek hai na? Wohi keh rahe the Kadir ji woh matlab ki conversion ke liye
Executive: Hum conversion ka hum conversion surety bola hi nahi hai. Hum bola jo jo means aa raha hai na inquiry.
Customer: Haan haan. Theek hai na? Inquiry toh aisa ho na jo jaisa requirement ho.
Customer: Theek hai na? Haan. Uh toh aapne fir hum bol rahe hain. Jo inquiry aata hai woh bolta hai mera require aaj bhi ek dekhiye aap agar check kar rahe ho toh hum khud liya tha. Theek hai na mera iPhone se.
Executive: Achcha. Theek hai na? iPhone se ek inquiry aaya tha notification aata hai fatak se click kiya aapka itna ghatiya system hai aane ke baad woh loading hota hai. Loading hone ka Android mein woh nahi hota hai lekin iPhone mein hota hai loading. Theek hai na round karke ek GIF lagaya hua hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Achcha. Uh toh woh loading jab tak hota hai tab tak expire ho jata hai.
Customer: Theek hai? Loading matlab tab tak woh screen refresh hone tak matlab jab expire show kar deta hai. Yeh kar rahe hain aap. Ek loader hota hai na bahut sara site mein dekhe ho na ek loader. Gol karke ghumte ek loader. Loader complex cycle hota hai. Hmm. Woh matlab internet issue nahi woh loader laga hua rehta hai. Theek hai na? Jab tak loader aisa nahi hai mera network yeh hai mera fiber connectivity hai. Theek hai na? Achcha. Uh toh jab jab tak loader lagaya loader lagane ka koi zarurat tha hi nahi. Toh jab tak loader complete hoga tab aapko jo woh jo inquiry jo humne inquiry boli hai woh buylead se purchase kiya tab mein woh visible hoga.
Executive: Achcha woh tab tak woh option aata hai woh click to pay karne ka. Main samajh gaya.
Customer: Haan toh woh expire ho jata hai. Jo hai digital marketing kiya woh expire ho gaya. Ek ek ek design na e-commerce ka tha woh woh hum dekh paya. Theek hai na usko phone kiya. Achcha. Toh hum hum woh bola humko koi zarurat nahi hai hum just check kar raha tha. Theek hai na?
Customer: Aisa toh hum bhi bahut sara kisi ko dekh sakta hai. Dikhta nahi woh alag baat hai. Mera team bhi dekh sakta hai dusra company ka team bhi dekh sakta hai. Agar aisa hi lead aate rehta hai kya fayda hai?
Customer: Theek hai na? Aisa hi lead aata hai means mera hum dikha doge itna lead aaya toh lead ka quality kaisa hai? Har ek ek bar ek bar hum do teen company ka naam bolte piconet solution woh dekhta hai un logon ka taraf se phone jata hai toh hum hum mera team ko bola agar aisa company ka naam dekhoge woh usko chhod do. Theek hai na?
Customer: Toh piconet solutions aa raha hai toh aisa view karte hain hum log ka buylead faltu ka chala chala jata hai. In log jaan bujh ke karta hai.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai na? Toh usko le aur Kolkata circle se sab kharide and barbaad ho sab lead.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Kya hum log aisa faltu ka
Executive: Sir ji aaj humne na lagbhag saat buylead uthaya hai IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hum log toh uthate hain hum jo khud se uthaya woh bol raha hun. Theek hai na agar fatak se mere paas agar genuine inquiry hoga toh mera paas aa jayega. Agar pehle dekho conversion ka baat toh bhul hi jao.
Customer: Theek hai na? Hum toh bola hai aapko bhi bol raha tha sabko bola hai jab agar genuine inquiry hai.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aaj woh saat buylead inquiry aap hi ne uthaya tha ki aapki team ke sath mein? Nahi nahi nahi mera team ne hum shayad ek uthaya tha aur baki. Achcha aapne ek. Ha ha humne ek uthaya tha toh problem kya hai usme?
Customer: Ha. Bahut sara problem hai.
Customer: Toh usme jo problem hai isme kuch kam ke like banta hi nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha. Theek hai na jo inquiry jo inquiry hai inquiry agar bolta hai mera inquiry nahi tha. Mera mera hum aisa dekh rahe hain nahi toh woh digital marketing jo hai hum click kiya. Uh uske yeh slide karte hum aur ek inquiry mila tha jo teen din pehle ka tha. Theek hai na? Haan. Uske kya click karke humne dekha tha. Haan. Woh number is means ring nahi ho raha hai. Band hai.
Customer: Aisa bahut sara hai. Achcha. Toh isiliye thoda aapko dukha hai humne. Theek hai na? Agar aisa bologe hum lead de rahe hain hum conversion toh dur ka baat hai aap bhi phone karke dekho aapko bhi aap ek bhi inquiry convert nahi kar paoge.
Executive: Ek se bhi toh na baat nahi ho pa rahi hai hamari yeh kar rahe hain. Customer: Are baat nahi ho pa rahi agar aapne inquiry kiya aapko hum phone kiya bole aap agar bologe hum aisa hi check kar raha tha. Kya karega usme?
Executive: Achcha. Aapka jo primary wala jo number hai sir wohi wohi dekhte hain na baki jo inquiry wohi uthate hain na? Customer: Haan wohi dekhta hai sab phone karta hai phone karta hai har cheez mein nahi toh bolte nahi mera inquiry nahi hai hum aise hi check kar raha tha. Hum hi aisa service deta hai. Theek hai na?
Customer: Nahi toh phone band hai toh hum toh ek bhi kam aisa nahi. Ek ek bar na fir se unse ek bar baat karke thoda sa puchh leta hun ki kya ho raha hai thoda sa dekh lijiye. Customer: Aur excuse agar aisa hai aap toh refund toh nahi karoge karne wala hai nahi. Theek hai na? Toh service aap sab kuch humne samajh gaya. Theek hai na?
Executive: Hello. Main jante hain sir ji main maine apne level pe baat kiya unse lekin wohi hai wohi jo aapne jo unhone discuss karke bataya tha wohi. Customer: Is bar is bar last hai jitna jitna aap log ro hum toh jaan hum toh humko toh malum hai na hum log ek premium aap log ke liye customer hai. Theek hai na?
Hmm hmm. Customer: Toh aap log ko rona February month se start ho jayega. Theek hai na? Tab humne batayenge. Ek bar na sir main aapke jo abhi abhi aapka question hoga na jyada mahine toh nahi hai. Jyada mahine nahi hai February mahine aayega tab aapke face khatam karne dijiye. Aap log Delhi se phone karega Delhi branch se phone karega rona start hoga tab hum toh kaise bhi hai hum karega hi nahi. Kaise bhi hai karega. Dekho hum log koshish karte hain thoda sa isko aur bhi manage thoda sa aapse aur aapki team se thoda sa discuss karke to abhi toh activate activate toh rahega hi na. Mera woh jo sir. Ha sir sir main wohi keh raha tha ki wohi main ek bar nahi hoga toh na aapke woh jo primary wala jo number hai na jo aapke employee hai na unse main ek bar discuss karke thoda sa ek bar online la ke thoda sa keyword wagera hai na fir se ek bar thoda sa connect karke mapping karta hun. Theek hai na jaise bol rahe hain. Dekho agar dekho agar aap satisfactory satisfactory kuch milega. Ha agar mahina hai satisfactory kuch hoga. Kuch hoga kuch hoga mere ko kuch dekho. Hum log aisa nahi hai aapko itna itna jo achcha service provider hai theek hai na review bhi aap dekh liya hum mera customer logon ko bola IndiaMART mein review dene ke liye jis jis ke account se review bhi diya hai dekha hai hum logon ka rating. Theek hai na? Google mein bhi aap check kar liya rating har jagah mein mera ko rating check kar lo theek hai na international customer bhi aap service aap achcha dete ho tabhi toh customer bhi aapko rating achcha dete hain. To international customers bhi hum logon ke paas bahut sara hai join karte hain theek hai na to samajh gaya hum IndiaMART aur next time sir ji isse isse dekhiye na hum google ka partner hai meta ka partner hai udhar kyun nahi karenge hum kyun faltu ka faltu company ke piche daudenge. Socha tha kuch hoga indian company hai kuch hoga. Galti ho gaya. Theek hai na? Main isko main abhi thoda sa na main baat karta hun aapke band se baat karega. Hum toh hum 10000 hum 10000% sure hai hum karega hi nahi. Theek hai na? Sir pehle isko karte hain sir ji theek hai na abhi hum baad me decide kar lenge pehle isko karte hain. Main aapke band se ek bar baat karta hun sir ji kal ka meeting nikalta hun main discuss karta hun theek hai na aur isko update karte hain. Woh bhi shayad interested nahi hoga sir dekho karta hai ki nahi. Ek bar dekh lijiye try karta hun theek hai na. Chaliye okay thank you.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.
- Inquiries are not relevant or responsive.
- Experiencing loading issues on iPhone.
- Believes some leads are from competitors checking prices.
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive assured to discuss with team.
- Executive offered to help with keyword mapping.
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Executive will discuss with team and call back.
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
refund\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Neutral\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- buyleads, quality, iphone, loading, competitors\n
\n
